## Quality control

```{r ShortRead, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
library(ShortRead)
setwd("../data/")
fqQC <-qa("R1.fastq")
report(fqQC, type="html", dest="fastqQC_R1")
fqQC2 <-qa("R2.fastq")
report(fqQC2, type="html", dest="fastqQC_R2")
```
